mapper.select: SELECT d.id , d.subject , (SELECT dp.name FROM dept dp WHERE dp.id = d.dept_id) AS production_dept_name , d.public_range , (SELECT df.name FROM doc_form df WHERE df.id = d.doc_form_id) AS doc_form_name , DATE_FORMAT(d.create_at, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS create_at , DATE_FORMAT(ds.read_at, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS read_at , (SELECT a.name FROM approval a WHERE a.id = ds.approval_id) AS approval_kind_name , (SELECT m.name FROM member m WHERE m.id = ds.member_id) AS approval_member_name , ds.read_chk , ds.approval FROM doc d INNER JOIN doc_status ds ON d.id = ds.doc_id AND ds.doc_id NOT IN( SELECT ds2.doc_id FROM doc_status ds2 WHERE ds2.approval = 2 GROUP BY ds2.doc_id) WHERE d.member_id = #{loginId} AND d.status = 1 AND ds.approval = 0 GROUP BY d.id ORDER BY d.create_at DESC

SELECT d.id , d.subject , d.content , d.status , d.doc_form_id , d.dept_id , d.public_range , (SELECT dp.name FROM dept dp WHERE dp.id = d.dept_id) AS production_dept_name , d.job_level_name , (SELECT m.name FROM member m WHERE m.id = d.member_id) AS create_member_name , ds.member_id , (SELECT df.name FROM doc_form df WHERE df.id = d.doc_form_id) AS doc_form_name , DATE_FORMAT(d.create_at, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS create_at , (SELECT a.name FROM approval a WHERE a.id = ds.approval_id) AS approval_kind_name , ds.job_name AS approval_member_job_name , (SELECT m.name FROM member m WHERE m.id = ds.member_id) AS approval_member_name , ds.read_chk , ds.approval FROM doc d INNER JOIN doc_status ds ON d.id = ds.doc_id and ds.member_id = #{loginId} WHERE d.id = #{docId} AND d.status = 1

SELECT COUNT(c.id) FROM (SELECT d.id FROM doc d INNER JOIN doc_status ds ON d.id=ds.doc_id INNER JOIN (SELECT ds2.doc_id, MAX(ds2.order_rank) AS max_order_rank FROM doc_status ds2 GROUP BY ds2.doc_id) AS ds2 ON d.id = ds2.doc_id AND ds.order_rank = ds2.max_order_rank WHERE d.dept_id = #{deptId} AND d.status = 1 AND ds.approval = 1
